definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Laryngeal electromyography (LEMG) plays a potentially significant role in the diagnosis of neuromuscular disorder of the larynx .
sentences.chinese: 喉肌电图为诊断喉部肌肉及神经性疾病的直接方法。

sentences.english: It provides a continuous flow of air into the throat and lungs while the person sleeps.
sentences.chinese: 当病人入睡后，它向病人的喉部和肺部提供持续气流。

sentences.english: The warbler has a white throat and underparts.
sentences.chinese: 那种莺的喉部和身体下部为白色。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the surgery skill in examination and extraction of pharyngolaryneal foreign body(PFB).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨咽喉部异物检查及取出的方法和技巧。

sentences.english: The seat and field of activity of Prana is from the heart to the throat.
sentences.chinese: 普拉那活动的位置和区域是从心到喉部。

sentences.english: They have a short, dark mane, a dewlap hanging from the throat, and long horns twisted in a tight spiral.
sentences.chinese: 有黑色短鬃毛，喉部有下悬的肉垂，长角盘扭成螺旋。

sentences.english: Metaplasia of laryngeal respiratory epithelium has occurred here in a smoker.
sentences.chinese: 嗜烟者喉部呼吸道上皮化生。

sentences.english: The dog sprang at his throat.
sentences.chinese: 那只狗朝他的喉部扑上去。

sentences.english: The larynx of a human being did not evolve without having some function.
sentences.chinese: 倘若人类的喉部不行使任何功能，它便不会进化。

sentences.english: I'm taking antibiotics for a throat infection.
sentences.chinese: 抗生素对治疗咽喉部感染是很有效的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical characteristics of laryngeal granular cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的结合文献探讨喉部颗粒细胞瘤的临床特征。

sentences.english: The dewlap should not be pendulous and excessive.
sentences.chinese: 喉部不应该下垂或过于夸张。

sentences.english: The feeling may radiate through the chest and into the throat and neck.
sentences.chinese: 这种感觉可能从胸部放射到咽喉部和颈部。

sentences.english: "One name for rabies, hydrophobia ("fear of water"), comes from painful throat contraction on trying to swallow. "
sentences.chinese: 狂犬病又称恐水病，是因为吞咽时喉部收缩而疼痛。

sentences.english: And the only function I can see is sexual attraction.
sentences.chinese: 关于喉部，我所知晓的唯一功能就是性吸引力。

sentences.english: Tilt your head back and let the meat slide down your throat-hole.
sentences.chinese: 把头向后仰仰，让肉从你的喉部滑下去。

definition: esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
